When you hear the name Proscan, immediately you think of quality-built, high performance televisions at reasonable prices. The folks at Proscan have once again delivered on these core values with their all new, 32-Inch LED HD TV with built in ATSC Tuner! Product Description

HAOCROWN 32” FULL HD WITH 10-POINT MULTI-TOUCH CAPACITY SCREEN

In combination with the touch screen technology, you can easily browse through all the available options, choose your favorite programs, change the volume and turn the TV on and off with a simple touch of the TV screen. (Only suitable for use in HDMI2 channel)

The touch screen is very sensitive to slight and fast touch. Anti-scratch, not afraid of dust, water, and dirt, suitable for use in harsh environments.

The TV is being used in the shower area for easy accessibility and added safety. Don’t miss out on this amazing opportunity to showcase the latest spa technology and gain full control of your TV viewing experience.

Haocrown 32-inch Touch Screen IP66 Waterproof TV Smart Mirror for Bathroom LED TV Android 11.0 Full-HD Televions

MAIN INFORMATION OF 32 INCH TOUCH-SCREEN MIRROR BATHROOM TV IN HAOCROWN

LED display Size (diagonal): 32 inchesColor Options: MirrorBuilt-in the System (HDMI2 Channel): Android 11.0 (Quad-Core Processor)Control Type: Full Touch screen for 10 Point-Touch Control in smart system (HDMI2 channel)Brightness: 500 cd/m² (Ensure a great viewing experience in the bathroom that is usually well lit)Two installation Mode: Wall-mountable and Flush-mounted（Two Brackets are included in the Package）Speaker: Built-in two 8Ωx5W waterproof speakers / Or support Audio out available for external speakersTV Channel : HDTV,ATSC , Manual and automatic channel searchingDefault Language: English, Multi-lingual choiceRAM&ROM : 8G & 64G (Large memory makes the TV run smoothly and download more software)Resolution : 1920×1080 , 1080P FHD (you will have a clear picture and the image seems bright)Smart TV( HDMI2 Channel) Support: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Netflix, Youtube, etc.Support Multiple Modes：TV，HDMI1，HDMI2(Built-in Android 11.0 system, Support 10 Point-Touch Control），Media(USB2.0).

WHY PEOPLE WILL CHOOSE OUR HAOCROWN WATERPROOF BATHROOM TELEVISION?

WHY PEOPLE WILL CHOOSE OUR HAOCROWN WATERPROOF BATHROOM TELEVISION?

IP66 Triple Waterproof Protection

The whole TV housing passed IP66-Waterproof CertifiedWater-resistant, Dust-proof and Anti-fogSuitable for Humid and wet conditions

Luxury magic mirror design

Diamond-grade nano-silver mirror glassThe bathroom television is completely hidden in mirror.Full mirror when TV is off

2.4G/5.8G Wifi &BT 4.2

Stable, Fast 2.4G 5.8G WiFi signalBluetooth 4.2 ,Easily connect to bluetooth devices

Touch Smart Android 11.0 System

Full-Screen 10 Point Touch controlSimple Connect to Wi-Fi, easy access Netflix, YouTube..etc.

Image Feedback from our customers

Better tv than I expected

“”Great tv, i wired it directly to a speaker so I dont know if the sound quality is good, but through an external speaker its perfect.””

Impressive. Great mirror/TV for our bathroom.

“Impressed. When TV is off, looks like a normal mirror in our bathroom. Turn on the TV and the picture shows through really well. Running Android so easy to install apps. All good. Can watch from the bath with no problem. Comes with two ways to install (mounting cage or wall bracket). Good picture and sound. Overall pleased with this set.”

That it works well in the bathroom

“Would have been better if it swivelled but as it is in the bathroom it needs to be waterproof! But in every other respect it works very well and was just what was required!!”

Excellent Product

“Good product build quality, looks great in my bathroom.

Android portion is quite quick, and also can use on its own if you use a Chrome Cast and stream to the device. Adding a speaker definitely improves the sound which is quite ‘tinny’ out of the box.”

PACKAGE INCLUDE：

1 x 32-inch Touchscreen Smart Bathroom TV1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control (Need CR2025 battery）1 x Power Adapter and cord1 x Embedded Bracket with screws1 x On-Wall Bracket with screws1 x Installation Manual1 x HDMI Cable

(Kindly Note: The battery is not included.)

EASY TO INSTALL IN TWO MODES

On Wall-mounted:

Hole Spacing: VESA standard 200 x 200 mm

In Wall-mounted:

The Embedded Bracket Dimensions: 800 x 516 x 40mm/31.5″W x 20.3″H x 1.6″DThe Wall Hole Dimensions: 805 X 521 X 40 mm/31.7″W X 20.5″H X 1.6″D

Come included with a Wall-mount and Recess mounting Bracket in the Package

USB 3.0*1,LAN *1,HDMI input*1,Audio output *1,TV input*1,USB 2.0*1,DC 12V input*1

[IP66 100% Waterproof with safety]: Haocrown Waterproof TV is Built to the IP66-Certified Waterproof Standards, the whole machine with triple waterproof treatment, dustproof and anti-fog which can effectively prevent the damage of the TV from flushing. Powered with safe low voltage DC 12V, which design for humid Areas, Suitable for use in bathrooms, shower rooms, saunas, and spas etc. Let You Relax in the Bath and Tune in to Your Favourite TV Shows.
[2-in-1 Vanishing Mirror TV design]: Haocrown 32 inch smart TV is completely embedded within a luxury mirror. A mirror when turned off, but changes into a beautiful showpiece when you want it to. Power-on features enhanced brightness 500 LED screen to ensure excellent bright picture quality in usually well lit. It comes with endless possibilities. It is perfect for Bathrooms, offices, Gyms and many more locations, any space will come alive.
[Smart Android 11.0 System & HDTV Digital Tuner] Comes with the world’s most popular Android 11.0 operating system in HDMI2 channel.Haocrown Bathroom TV provides abundant content,Simply Connect to Wi-Fi or Lan, enjoy such as YouTube, Netflix,etc Entertainment essentials come pre-installed. 8 GB RAM, 64 GB Storage let you feel at ease to download more APP via the Google Play Store. Built-in ATSC tuner, supports digital HDTV programs.
【EASY TO INSTALL IN TWO MODES】：The Haocrown Waterproof TVs Come included with a Wall-mount and Recess mounting Bracket in the Package.Recess Dimensions for In-wall: 800 x 516 x 40mm/31.5″W x 20.3″H x 1.6″D. 【Support interfaces:】USB 3.0*1,LAN *1,HDMI input*1,Audio output *1,TV input*1,USB 2.0*1,DC 12V input*1【1 YEAR WARRANTY 】If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.We will respond within 24 hours.

Haocrown Smart Bathroom TV

From 5-star hotels to residential homes, Haocrown Bathroom TV’s have been the luxury bathroom TV of choice since 2012.

Previous page

  2. The HAOCROWN brand was established in 2012.

    HAOCROWN Focusing on the design and manufacture of professional waterproof TVs

    The full-screen touch function is added to the IP66 waterproof TV with a safe DC12V low-voltage power supply allowing you to easily create a bathroom theater.

    From 5-star hotels to residential homes, Haocrown Bathroom TVs have been the luxury bathroom TV of choice.

  3. Smart Bathroom Mirror TV

    Visit the Store

  4. Create Your Bathroom Theater

    Haocrown Waterproof TV is an All-round Bathroom TV.

    You can exquisite bath time experience once the Haocrown Bathroom TV is installed.

  5. Why Haocrown‘s bathroom tv more expensive than normal TVs?

    There are several factors that increase the manufacturing costs.The main points are you safety and making the units waterproof.

    The units muse pass industry Highest IP66 waterproof standards which means great care needs to be taken when manufacturing.

    When the TV is turned OFF, can you see the screen outline within the mirror?

    No – it allowed the TV screen to be totally invisible when turned OFF,

    giving the appearance of a true mirror. Then when the TV is turned ON

    , the screen appears clearly within the mirror

Next page

(as of Nov 29,2022 09:28:37 UTC – Details)


The Skyworth premium 720P HD LED television offers perfect picture quality and sound. A TV made for the future with it’s premium LED panel and a53 quad-core Processors for both graphics and power. Durable alloy with the Gilt color and sand-blasting, the S3G Series is a TV made for the future. Skyworth was established in 1988, with the head office located within Shenzhen High Tech Industrial Park which is honored as “China’s silicon valley”, and has more than 40, 000 employees. Skyworth is a large-scale high-tech corporation mainly engaged in the development and manufacturing of consumer electronics, display devices, digital set top boxes, security monitors, network communication, semi-conductors, refrigerators, washing machines, cell phones and LED lighting etc. In 2000 Skyworth was listed on the main board of HK Stock Exchange (HK0751). After a development of more than 30 years, Skyworth has grown to be one of the Top Five Color TV brands in the world and a top brand in Chinese display industry market.
Google Assistant Built-in: No complicated button operation is needed, immediate voice identification with a one-click voice button. Watching movies, checking the weather, listening to music, and game karaoke have never been quicker.
Chromecast Built-in: Download Chromecast-enabled apps to your phone, tablet, or laptop, you can watch movies, live shows, and games from your device on our TV in this way.
Excellent Audio Technology: Built-in 2*6W independent dual-tone speakers, make the sound more shocking. Allows you to experience cinematic sound effects at home.
Multiple device input/output options: 2*HDMI, 2*USB, Ethernet, Composite In, RF In, Digital Audio Out.
What Comes with Package: Voice remote, table stand, charge cable, 2-year warranty, and 7*24 hour considerate customer service.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

(as of Nov 29,2022 02:20:02 UTC – Details)


Everything you need is right in your screen. Watch, work and chat – all without connecting a separate PC – with the Smart Monitor. Your favorite content, productivity and video call apps are built-in for a simpler and more stylish desk setup that’s a joy to use every time. *App availability may vary by country and separate subscriptions may be required. Requires internet connection and TV tuner is not included. Samsung TV Plus and Universal Guide may not be available in some regions. Remote control specifications may vary by country. Product color availability may vary by country. **Product color availability may vary by country. ***Apple TV+ may not be available in all regions.****On-screen content simulated for demonstration purpose. Microsoft 365 requires Microsoft account. Wireless DeX supported on selected Galaxy, Note, and Tab devices. Windows 10 Pro, Mac OS 10.5, or higher, and compatible network settings are required for this feature. Product color availability may vary by country. *****Available technology, functions and features may vary by country, service provider, network environment or product, and are subject to change without notice. Requires a Wi-Fi, Bluetooth or other wireless network connection and devices registered to SmartThings app. Connected devices are sold separately. For full compatible device list, please check https://www.smartthings.com/products. A separate SmartThings Dongle is required to connect to Zigbee devices. (Connection to Z-Wave device is not supported.) ******Amazon, Alexa and all related marks are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. Bixby voice commands recognize English (US/UK/IN), French, Spanish, German, Italian, Portuguese(BR), Chinese (in China mainland only) and Korean.
SMART TV EXPERIENCE: Enjoy Netflix, YouTube and other streaming services by simply connecting the monitor to WiFi; Samsung TV Plus also offers free, live, on-demand content with no downloads or sign-up needed, while Universal Guide provides personalized content recommendations*.
FLAVORFUL COLOR OPTIONS: Smart Monitor provides a pop of your favorite color to instantly lighten any room design; Choose from white, pink, blue or green and make your space authentically you**
ICONIC SLIM DESIGN: The Smart Monitor is built with your lifestyle in mind, delivering a more cutting-edge design; With an ultra-slim flat back, neat camera design and beautiful colors, the monitor offers a minimalist look that enhances your setup with super style***
PC-LESS PRODUCTIVITY: Browse the web, edit documents and work on projects, all without the need for a separate PC; With new Workmode, you can also remotely access another PC, use Microsoft 365 programs and connect to Samsung mobile devices with Samsung DeX for seamless working****
SLIMFIT CAMERA: The SlimFit camera with tilt functionality allows you to create the perfect angle while using your favorite video call apps like Google Duo, which can be accessed directly through the monitor; Camera cover and option to fully detach always protect your privacy

Price: $199.99 - $175.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:34:13 UTC – Details)


This 32″ HD RCA ROKU Smart TV delivers a user-friendly experience. The super-simple remote and dual-band wireless make it fast and easy to access your favorite content. This 32″ 720p 60Hz LED HDTV has three HDMI inputs for connecting your DVD, Blu Ray player or preferred video game console. Get content from your smartphone or tablet with the free mobile app. This RCA ROKU LED HDTV features a sleek modern design with its quad-pedestal stand. It enhances any room in the house. Roku Search allows you to easily search across top streaming channels by title, actor or director and now includes voice search. With a true 16:9 aspect ratio for viewing your movies the way that the director intended. Catch your favorite broadcast shows in high definition where available. Mount the unit on your wall or set it on top of your entertainment center. RCA + Roku TV puts your favorite broadcast TV programs, streaming channels, gaming console and other devices on an easy to access menu with a super simple remote control. The newly designed remote only has 17 buttons no longer do you need to flip through inputs or complicated menus. Imagine how easy it will be to watch any device, channel or streaming channels RCA + Roku TV is a new era of smart TV. In addition, easily search the top streaming channels like Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, Hulu Plus, YouTube, etc. by title, actor or director and find what you want to watch quickly.
HD RESOLUTION: Rich picture quality, High definition (720p) resolution for excellent detail, color and contrast.
WIRELESS CONNECTIVITY: Get fast and easy access to your favorite content to the dual band Wi-Fi connection
VOICE CONTROL: Voice search is available on the remote or free Roku mobile app and provides a fun and fast way to search for what you want to watch. Works with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant to help you find movie titles, launch or change channels, even switch inputs, using just your voice.
INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY: TV offers innovative features like fast and easy search across top channels to find where movies and shows are available for free, or see unbiased results ranked by price. and the free Roku mobile app turns your iOS or Android phone into an ultimate streaming companion with a handy remote, voice search and controls, private listening while viewing streaming entertainment and more.

RCA gets smarter

Roku TV is an easy way to stream what you love. Access 450,000+ movies and TV episodes across thousands of free or paid channels. Get features like fast and easy cross-channel search. And use the Roku mobile app to turn your iOS or Android phone into a handy remote.

Read more

Smart TV made simple

Simple, intuitive interface

The Roku TV home screen puts your favorite TV entertainment into one simple, intuitive interface. Quickly navigate the home screen to access popular streaming channels or view entertainment on devices such as game consoles or cable boxes – all your TV entertainment is in one place.

Amazing content. Endless Choice

Stream just about anything –movies, TV shows, live sports, news, and music. With 450,000+ movies and TV episodes to choose from, entertainment is on your schedule. It’s easy to find popular choices that you can rent, buy, subscribe to or watch for free.

Share photos and more on your TV

Easily share photos, videos, and music from your compatible smartphone or tablet right to your Roku TV. Enjoy fantastic slideshows and videos starring you and your friends and loved ones on the big screen.

Features:

  • Compatible with an over-the-air antenna
  • Enjoy Private listening with your mobile device
  • Live TV Pause
  • Free mobile app with voice search

Read more

Fast & easy search across top channels

With Roku Search, it’s easy to find where movies and shows are available, or see unbiased results across 300+ streaming channels.

Read more

RCA meets Roku

Your favorite, trusted home entertainment brand at the cutting edge with Roku’s modern, intuitive interface.

HDMI Input

HDMI ports allow you to connect any HDMI enabled devices, such as tablets, computers, or gaming consoles.

Easy-to-Use Remote

The super-simple Roku TV remote has only 20 buttons to make navigating easier. With around half the buttons of a traditional TV remote, you won’t have to struggle to find the button you need.

Modern, Sleek Design

The slim bezel gives the TV a sleek and modern look, to enhance the decor in any room.

Read more

The RCA 32″ LED 60Hz HDTV, features energy-efficient LED technology for a bright, clear picture. HD resolution provides an amazing entertainment experience. Enjoy more with the RCA 32″ Class 720p LED TV that invites you to enjoy a viewing experience that redefines reality on a large HD 720p 32″ LED screen. It supports a wide range of input technologies such as 3 HDMI, VGA, YPBPR, AV Audio/Video, PC Audio, Headphone, RF. The spectacular contrast ratio ensures vibrant and perfectly bright imagery. Screen refresh rate of 60Hz ; ensures blur-free and distortion-free images even in fast screen transitions.
